login2.text1: You will receive a confirmation code by text message or email.
login2.text2: When you receive the code, please enter it below.

error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired or is invalid.  Please log in.
error.serverNotAvailable: The server is not responding.  Please wait for one minute and log in, or contact your Administrator.
error.badCredentials: The username/password combination provided is not valid. Please try again.
error.unknown: An error occurred.  Please wait for one minute and log in, or contact your Administrator.
